title: Crognard the Barbarian
description: Never tell Crognard the odds. With Wizardess, Graah, and Spooch, Crognard can take down any monster, wizard, or dragon in this universe.
quote: By the power of Lobnarr! I have the energy!
altHero: Crognard, a large He-Man type, with Wizardess and Graah
alt2: the team faces down a giant with two heads
alt3: Crognard holding up a sword and radiating rainbow light
alt4: Crognard facing down a three-headed dragon
